idea-plugin.name: Maven Version Refactor
idea-plugin.description:
Intention com.mirkoalicastro.mavenversionrefactor.action that suggests extraction of a dependency version in a pom using a property.
Adds entry to Preferences | Editor | Intentions | SDK Intentions.
It is a high priority com.mirkoalicastro.mavenversionrefactor.action, enabled when the cursor is on a non-variable dependency version (both on text and tag).
idea-plugin.change-notes: • 1.0.0 First release of the IntelliJ plugin.
